text: Pre-pandemic, I went to a tech conference in the US. Someone there took great pains to tell me my outfit was way too formal for tech. They were worried that I (a grown woman!) had missed the tech fashion memo and that Iâ€™d be mortified to realise my mistake.

author.name: Dr Catherine Breslin
author.description: ML scientist now freelance :: ex Amazon Alexa, Toshiba, Cam Uni :: voice & language tech :: powered by coffee :: photographer :: contact details on my website
